name: Keloglan & 40 Dai Li
description:
"Keloglan & 40 Dai Li" is a fan-made Avatar game which you can bend 4 elements (no, there is no tahta in this game). It's an endless combat game, when you start the waves, enemies which are Dai Li Agents; will start to attack you. There is a kill counter and timer on top of the screen. You can submit your time and kill score in the comments.

We are Avatar fans before Game Developers, we always wanted to make an Avatar fan-made game but we never got the chance. When we learned the theme we said "Avatar" all together... We didn't make a story behind this game we just wanted to give a good combat experience. We hope we succeeded.

You can find the controls on a wall in game but to mention:

You have Health Bar, Mana, Ulti Bars & Current Element sign on the top-left

Q - Change Element  

Right Click - Aim  

Left Click - Light Attack  

E - Special Attack  

F - Ulti AttackYou have to aim for using Special Attacks on some Elements don't forget that

Made by Opulence with Love

Assets

Yes, we used assets, generally we prefer to make our own assets. But this game, we bought some :) Some of the scene elements and bending VFXs are from assets. But, Aang, Dai Li Agents and the other scene elements (rocks, trees, UI, HUD) made by our 3D & 2D Artists.
